meanings.definition: proteins that form the building blocks of microtubules in cells.
meanings.sent1: The tubulins in our cells help in the construction of tiny tubes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study tubulins to understand cell structure better.
meanings.sent3: The tubulins in the cell had a party and formed a tubulin chain.
meanings.sent4: Under the microscope, the tubulins looked like busy workers building roads.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used a model to explain how tubulins create microtubules in cells.
